name: Simple Twitter Slider
author: amybeagh

sections.description:
Take a look at the many amazing benefits offered to you with the Plugin.

i) Easy to Install.

ii) Takes just minutes to download and install

iii) This is a free tool that helps you connect to Twitter.

iv) Fully customizable features enable you to do more than you ever could before. Choose colors, border and more.

Use Shortcode

Easy to use Different pages or posts or widget using shortcode “[sm_tw_slider]”.

Use This Code in Page Template <?php echo do_shortcode('[sm_tw_slider]');?>.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Install the wordpress plugin first

You can install it via WordPress Installer or can download the file first then Upload it on /wp-content/plugins/directory

  1. Activate the plugin

  2. You will see Simple Twitter Slider settings from right side of your wordpress menu.

Configuration Options:

Twitter Profile Name : Put your twitter username in this field.

Twitter Widget ID :

go to https://twitter.com/settings/widgets
then click create new and put your username then click Create Widget will get an ID like 346792666668871680 this – copy it and put on the widget id field

Slider Theme : Choose Light or Dark

Margin Top, Width & Height : Numeric value as per you need.
